title: DiaTool-DPO: Multi-Turn Direct Preference Optimization for Tool-Augmented Large Language Models
details: S Jung, D Lee, S Lee, G Seo, D Lee, B Ko, J Cho… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Tool-Augmented Larage Language Models (TA-LLMs) have shown promise in real- world applications, but face challenges in handling incomplete queries and out-of- scope requests. While existing approaches rely mainly on Supervised Fine-Tuning …
